properties.entry: INSERT /* com.kkpjj.sysostory.model.dao.MemberDAO#insertMember() */ INTO TBL_USER_INFO ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT /* com.kkpjj.sysostory.model.dao.MemberDAO#loginMember() */ USER_ID , USER_PWD FROM TBL_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
SELECT USER_ID FROM TBL_USER_INFO WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ?
SELECT USER_PWD FROM TBL_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ?
